phrases: I cannot let Croix do as she pleases any longer.
I cannot let Croix do as she pleases any longer.
She must be stopped...
Before it is too late.
I never imagined this could happen.
A new fact has come to light about the contested goal.
Protests, in the meanwhile, are continuing to escalate.
Meanwhile, protests are continuing to escalate.
The opposing faction has ended their silence and launched counterprotests in turn.
In response, the opposing faction has ended their silence and begun counter protests.
Some supporters have even resorted to radical actions.
The two countries have opposed each other in three wars since the middle ages,
We cannot continue this appeasement policy any longer.
There is only one outcome to this long-held appeasement.
They are taking us for soft.
This is not just a matter of winning or losing a match anymore.
They scorn us as weak-willed.
This is no longer just about winning or losing a game.
Their nation as a whole thinks they can take advantage of us.
The time for compromise is over.
We must show them our firm resolve!
The time for compromise is over.
We must demonstrate our firm resolve.
You are still a child so long as I must keep cleaning up your messes.
It is your duty and responsibility as next in the Hanbridge line to become a great statesman.
I could not even respond.
Did not I tell you that there was no need to concern yourself?
I had almost fully recovered at that point.
Nearly everything was healed back then.
But it was my fault you even got hurt in the first place.
But I am glad you came.
There is something I needed to talk to you about.
There is something I need to talk to you about.
Fasanshielle Shearyla.
Fasanshielle Shearyla?
The seventh star will shine as it answers to the feelings in your heart.
I have been trying to find the right time to tell you for so long.
Sorry Lotte, can you give me a ride?
H-Hopefully I will be able to answer it for you.
Are you aware that an abundance of magic energy surpassing the Sorcerer's Stone's output is being gathered?
Do not tell me she was affected by Wagandea's pollen...
Geez, your sudden call caught me at the wrong time.
Geez, how was I supposed to be ready for your sudden call?
I intended to alert you immediately, but I did not expect calls and emails to be blocked.
All we have around here is one-way messaging through magic.
I guess that explains why you contacted Diana.
We have only got one-way communication by using magic.
I guess that explains why you contacted Diana.
Seriously though, that was way too little notice.
I barely made it on time.
Anyway, I apologize for rushing you.
I was on the way to Parliament with my father.
So I figured this timing would work for us both.
Parliament?
Wow, that sounds impressive.
Hardly.
I am just attending with my father.
The enmity from a soccer match escalated and ended up exacerbating the hatred between our nation and the other.
The enmity from a soccer match escalated and ended up severely increasing the hatred between the two nations.
Reportedly, there are similar protests within their borders too.
It seems there are similar demonstrations within their borders too.
Our countries have been at ends since the middle ages.
Things were finally starting to improve recently.
And now look how little it took to set us back on edge again.
And yet look how easily we have returned to being on the edge.
It is truly saddening.
Also, that kind of scares me.
They will be thrilled and laugh and get emotional
They will laugh?
Then that will lead to world peace!
That is some unrealistic idealism.
You are not laughing?
Usually you would be snorting at me or something.
It would be wonderful if that could be realized.
Y-You mean I should?
That is right...
Guess they are not.
I would say not.
You should really try to limit your silliness to the school grounds.
You should really keep your stupidity for when we are on campus.
I remember them at the Wild Hunt too.
I saw all these weird squarey things all over town!
You made those people
You made those people...
The emotion of anger comes within them.
The emotion of anger was born inside them.
All I did was simply enhance it slightly and absorb it.
I simply enhanced it slightly and absorbed it.
Absorbed?
But why?
Noir fuel spirit.
Anger, hatred, sadness, jealousy, fear, anxiety
We must have a method to convert some sort of energy into it.
Do not you see how fantastic it would be if we could harvest human emotions as a new source of that very energy?
Do not you see how fantastic it would be if we could convert human emotions into a new energy source?
Crowd psychology is the easiest to manipulate.
I have been gathering emotions using the app...
Professor Croix, you are acting weird.
I cannot comprehend incompetent witches who do nothing but chase after unrealistic dreams.
Deflaniard!
You are Shiny Chariot?
Finally realized?
Did not I say you would meet her soon?
The person you have admired has always been close by pulling the wool over your eyes.
I wanted to tell you it properly.
Why do not you be the one to tell her what happened the day Chariot descended from the stage forever.
What exactly you did to the moon.
Dream fuel spirit.
Magic to convert the power of dreaming into strong magical energy.
So what exactly gives you the right to stop me after using that yourself?
Do you have the right to stop me after using that yourself?
Dream fuel spirit gathers the dreaming energy of everyone in the area and turns it into magic.
But I had no other choice after all the time we spent together.
Never forget.
A believing heart is your magic.
You could not reach it yet again.
To the seventh Word.
I cannot let Croix go unchecked any longer.
She must be stopped...
Before it is too late.
Never did I imagine this could happen...
I need to tell Akko everything as well.
Take action!
Take action!

Raise your hands!

Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
New facts have surfaced in the goal controversy.
At the same time, protests are continuing to escalate.
The opposing faction has ended their silence and launched counter-protests in turn.
Some supporters have started resorting to extreme measures.
The two countries have been at war three times since the middle ages,
and some are saying this uproar may be the start of a fourth
Our appeasement policy is reaching the end of its life.
They are taking us as weak-willed.
This is not just a matter of winning or losing a match anymore.
Their whole nation thinks they can take advantage of us.
The time for compromise is over.
We must demonstrate our firm resolve!
Is that really so?
Much time and effort was spent mending our relations.
Should we truly be willing to let that go to waste?
What, you think you can mouth off to me again?
Andrew.
This is one issue you cannot stick your nose in.
You should listen to your father's orders.
I overlooked the incident with the witch at Appleton in deference to your father,
but because any more problems, and I will be forced to act.
I will not allow any defiance.
So long as I must keep cleaning up your messes, you are still a child.
It is your duty and responsibility, as the Hanbridge heir, to become a great statesman.
Bear that in mind henceforth.
I could not even give one word in response.
If she had been watching, I would be getting called a coward about now.
There is Diana's messenger.
Now I will be able to contact Miss Kagari.
Coming.
Diana?
Good day.
Is Akko available?
Diana's looking for Akko?
She must be plotting something.
Come on, Sucy!
Akko just left to go see Professor Ursula.
Professor Ursula?
Thank goodness, you really do seem fine now.
Did not I tell you that there was no need to worry?
I was almost fully healed back then.
But it was my fault you even got hurt in the first place.
Akko, did not you promise not to say that anymore?
Yeah.
But I am glad you came.
There is something I needed to talk to you about.
What is that?
I will tell you the seventh and final Word.
Phasansheer Shearylla.
Phasansheer Shearylla?
Not even I know its meaning.
You do not?
Just remember that the final Word
lies within your heart.
Within my heart...
The seventh star will shine in response to the feelings in your heart.
When the seventh star shines, say the final Word.
Okay.
There is one more thing I need to tell you.
Huh?
There is?
I have been trying to find the right time to tell you for so long.
Listen, the truth is
Is Akko here?
Lotte?
Huh?!
Diana too?
I have a message from Andrew.
He will be waiting for you at High Street today.
Huh, Andrew said that?
Today?
He is got something to give you.
Really?
But, today...
What time today?
At three o
Three?!
That is cutting it close.
Professor!
Go ahead.
We can continue our conversation after you get back.
Thanks, Professor!
I will be right back!
Sorry, Lotte, but could you give me a ride?
Sure, let us hurry.
Excuse us!
I-It is unusual for you to come here.
There is something I would like to ask you.
You have a question for me?
H-Hopefully I will be able to answer it for you...
Are you aware of the recent concentration of magic energy, surpassing even the output of the Sorcerer's Stone?
After looking into it, events relating to that matter began after Professor Croix installed her SSS in Luna Nova.
I believe you were old friends with Professor Croix, so I had hoped you might know something about this.
I am sorry, but something just came up.
Professor?
We will finish this later!
Professor!
Do not tell me...
Was she affected by Wagandea's pollen?
Geez, out of everyone it could have been, I never excepted you to call for me.
Forgive me, but I wanted to return this.
Oh, right.
I forgot it in your car back then.
I intended to alert you immediately, but who would expect all calls and emails to be barred?
You are telling me.
All we have got is one-way messaging through magic.
I guess that explains why you contacted Diana.
Thanks to our families.
Seriously though, that was way too little notice.
I barely made it in time.
Do not you know I cannot ride a broom?
Why do you sound so proud about that?
Anyway, I apologize for rushing you.
I was on the way to Parliament with my father.
I figured this timing would work for us both.
Parliament?
Wow, that sounds kind of fancy.
It is not, really.
I am just accompanying my father.
No goal!
No goal!
No goal!
No goal!
Wh-What is that?
That is actually part of the reason we are heading to Parliament.
What is going on?
The enmity from a soccer match escalated and ended up exacerbating the hatred between our nation and their's.
There seem to be similar demonstrations within their borders too.
Our two countries have been at ends since the Middle Ages.
Only recently were things finally starting to improve.
Yet look how little it took to set us back on edge again.
It is such a shame.
No matter what their reasons are, I just cannot understand how they can keep being so angry.
And... it kind of scares me too.
I am with you.
This is exactly the kind of situation we need Chariot for.
Everyone should go and see Chariot's show.
They would be thrilled and laugh and get emotional
Then all their anger and negativity will be blown away.
They would laugh?
And get emotional!
And then, all the world will be at peace!
That is quite the quixotic idealism.
Huh?
You are not laughing?
Usually, you would be snorting at me or something.
I will not laugh.
It would be wonderful if that could turn into reality.
Far better than what is happening right now.
You have come to accept magic just a little bit more than before.
Perhaps my opinion of you has improved slightly over time.
But there is one thing I must say.
You want people to be moved and happiness brought upon them.
But what is the point if you just rely on Chariot and do not do it yourself?
Y-You mean I should do it?
Do you disagree?
No, you have got it right.
Fine, I will do it!
Oh?
What is with that look?
You can bet I will do it!
Just watch me, Andrew!
That thing!
I saw it before!
Sorry, Andrew!
I have got to go!
See you later!
Sure
What is the point if you do not do it yourself?
That is right...
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
I wonder if things are going well with Akko and Andrew.
Come back!
Wait!
Guess not.
Akko?
You should really try to limit your foolishness to the school grounds.
Look!
That looks like the things that were flying around during the strike.
I remember seeing them at the Wild Hunt too.
Bad stuff happens whenever these things are around.
There too...
I have got a bad feeling about this.
Hey!
Look at that!
Those bastards!
They will pay for this!
This is war!
It is only getting worse.
Huh?
Where is Akko?
Professor Croix?
Professor Croix!
This is bad, Professor Croix!
Why are you here?
Sorry, there is a very complicated reason for that...
I see.
So it was only coincidence that brought you to the city.
You do not even have Claimh Solais on you.
Claimh Solais?
What is that?
Wait, that is not important right now!
I saw all these weird, square-y things all over town!
They are definitely doing something bad!
Like that!
It is that thing!
Good work.
I developed these in order to convert emotions into energy.
You made those people...?
Not quite.
The emotion of anger comes from within them.
All I did was enhance it slightly and absorb it.
Absorb it?
But why?
Noir Fuel Spirit.
You can convert strong human emotions into powerful magic energy.
That is why I am probing the hearts of people around the world
Anger, hatred, sadness, jealousy, fear, anxiety
I want to completely absorb all of those emotions.
Absorb... emotions?
You should be aware as well.
Magic is in decline all around the world.
If nothing is done, magic will one day disappear entirely.
We need a method to generate it from some sort of energy.
Do not you see how fantastic it would be if we could harvest human emotions as a new energy source?
Manipulation is easiest with crowd psychology.
I have been gathering emotions through this app...
And the results far exceed my expectations!
There is more than enough for my world reconstruction plan to come to fruition!
They will all see magic in a new light!
Professor Croix, you are acting weird!
Stop doing something like that!
Why?
Are you saying you would not mind if magic was lost forever?
Magic will not go away!
I will not let it!
How?
Feelings by themselves cannot change the worldyou must take action.
Still... this is wrong!
Magic...
Magic should be used to make people happy!
You say the same things as Chariot.
That is exactly why she failed.
I cannot comprehend incompetent witches who do nothing but chase after unachievable dreams.
This was a waste of time.
Our private lesson ends here.
You stay right there and keep your mouth shut.
Diphulaniado!
Chariot...
Professor... Ursula?
You have never learned how to keep your head down.
Do you still intend to interfere, Chariot du Nord?
Chariot?
You are...
Shiny Chariot?
So you finally realized?
Did not I say you would meet her soon?
The person you have so admired has always been right next to you, pulling the wool over your eyes.
I am sorry I kept this a secret from you.
I wanted to tell you properly.
That is enough, Croix!
Your methods are mistaken!
Do you intend to stop me?
You?
Stop me?
I am surprised you can say that with a straight face.
Do not you remember what you did ten years ago?
Why do not you be the one to tell her what happened the day Chariot descended from the stage forever?
What exactly it was that you did to the moon.
Dream Fuel Spirit.
Magic to convert the power of dreaming into strong magical energy.
What exactly gives you the right to stop me after using that yourself?
That power
Convert the power of dreaming into magic?
Oh, I see how it is now.
So that is the true reason you care so much about her.
Akko.
You saw Chariot's show in the past, did not you?
Huh?
Dream Fuel Spirit gathers the dreaming energy of everyone in the area and turns it into magic.
And those whose dreams are absorbed...
Lose their magic.
Is not that right, Chariot?
You tell her yourself.
When I learned that you once saw a Chariot show, I hoped it was not true.
I did not want to believe it.
But after all the time we spent together, I could not deny it anymore.
In all likelihood, I was the one who absorbed your magic.
The reason you cannot fly...
Is all my fault.
That is a lie...
Come on, Professor Ursula...
Say... it is a lie...
It must be a lie...
It is a lie...
It is a lie...
Never forget.
A believing heart is your magic.
That is a lie!
I doubt she will be looking for the Words any longer.
Yet again, you could not reach it.
The seventh Word.
